snippet.title: Police search for man in remote WA
snippet.content: A search is underway for a man missing in Western Australia's remote Pilbara region. Police are appealing for anyone travelling on the Canning Stock Route near Well 22, Lake Disappointment who might have seen or picked up a man. He is described as fair-skinned, of medium build and with blond hair. Anyone who may have seen him is urged to contact police immediately. (C) AAP 2017
